feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with freezing drizzle. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of snow near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023
